Name: repository-model-full
Body: {%- for property in model.Table.Columns -%}{% capture dataType %}{{ property.DataType | CSharp }}{% endcapture -%}
{% if property.IsIgnored %}// {% endif %}public {{ dataType }}{% if property.IsNullable and dataType != 'string' %}?{% endif %} {{ property.PropertyName }} { get; set; }
